source.title: Poaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons
source.citation: From: Walsh, N.G. (1994). Poaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaf-blades more than 1 mm wide; spikes generally more than 3 (except sometimes in the rare var. pulchellus), and more than 2 cm long; glumes at least half as long as floret
Leaf-blades very fine, less than 1 mm wide; spikes 1–3, mostly less than 1.5 cm long; glumes up to half as long as floret
